'suscription and resource group to an easily consumed oject in the service.'
'There are many ways to create a workspace. In this tutorial, you create a workspace via'
'the Azure portal, a we-ased console for managing your Azure resources.'
'1. Sign in to the Azure portal 2 y using the credentials for your Azure suscription.'
'2. In the upper-left corner of the Azure portal, select the three ars, then + Create a'
'resource.'
'https://r'
'Create a resource'
'Home'
'Dashoard'
'All services'
'3. Use the search ar to find Azure Machine Learning.'
'4. Select Azure Machine Learning.'
